ygData.subject: Shauri's and Crisson's (was: Re: Re: BARD HATE)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Whenever anyone shouts something to zone, my gut reaction is to hit Clouding.  It s saved me a number of times. Upon attaining my 28th song, I decided to
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 24 Oct 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:

> I remember Bard Hate in my earlier years while hunting in Unrest. While
> camping on the left wall waiting for my group's puller to return with some
> fair, I heard the shout "Hag to zone".

Whenever anyone shouts something to zone, my gut reaction is to hit
Clouding. It's saved me a number of times.

Upon attaining my 28th song, I decided to join the ranks of testers and
attempted to mez myself between pulls/spawns in Cazic-Thule/Highkeep. I
only ever managed two of the results, complete resist or successful stun
(i.e. no "icon up but movement possible"). I did notice one oddity.

Target self.
Start song.
"You are stunned!"
"You send forth music."
Mesmerized at this point.
"You are unstunned."
Movement possible at this point.
"You are no longer stunned."
Icon disappears.

It would seem that either the icon isn't linked to the song effect, or one
is handled client side (effect), and one exclusively by server (icon).

Athren Notechaser, turning cyclops brother against brother
